text: Leslie Randall (19 October 1924 â€“ 2 August 2020) was an English actor. He was born in South Shields, County Durham. He was known for starring in Joan and Leslie, ITV's first home-grown situation comedy. He also appeared in the 1963 movie version of Billy Liar where he played Danny Boon. On 2 August 2020, it was announced that Randall had died at age 95. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors
title: Leslie Randall (actor)
